title: fk off braum
body:
fking braum was asking me to verify my email so i did i asked them to send email and then resend it but i  didnt resieve anything
i tried contacting them but they wont let me cuz i need a verified email......so wtf
now i cant play league or ask those rioters to help me and i dont know what to do 
and i also forgot my password so fk this shit 
rioters u better contact me or do something cuz i am desperate 
PLS HELP{{sticker:zombie-nunu-tears}}
